name: happy-hour-need-more-trees
title: Happy Hour: Need More Trees
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• Bellevue will be getting 300 new trees this weekend in an effort to help secure the land and soak up water in the event that we experience another flood. [Tennessean]
  • The TVA is reporting that demand for power increased 6% last year throughout their coverage area, which includes Tennessee, Kentucky, Alabama, Mississippi, Georgia, North Carolina and Virginia. [WZTV]
  • Eddie Montgomery of Montgomery Gentry has been diagnosed with prostate cancer according to his publicist. He’ll be undergoing surgery next month and hopes to be “back in January and ready to rock.” We wish him the best! [WKRN]
  • Someone crashed their SUV through our beloved Hermitage Cafe yesterday evening, meaning that they’re closed while they repair the place. Remember, folks, the brake pedal is the one on the left. [WSMV]

Photo by Grey Street Girl.

No related posts.
